note.p: Birth: Elmshurst, Finchley, Middlesex, England (25 February 1835)
Death: Hawksfold, near Fernhurst, Sussex (01 June 1898)
Education: Trinity Hall, Cambridge. BA (1857), MA (1860)
Career: His travels included Guatemala and he collected natural history specimens; Curator of orthnithology, Cambridge (1874-1882); died of heart disease
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1898-1899 vol 64 pp xiii-xvii signed by A N
